Name: ASTRALODE Freeminers
About the game: ASTRALODE Freeminers is a special version of ASTRALODE focused on ARCADE MODE Launch clusters of mining tools into the gravitational pull of haphazardly spinning asteroids. Mine away their frozen exteriors and harvest the precious ore contained within, but be careful not to ruin the valuable lode with a badly aimed drill, bomb or Annihilazerâ„¢! Earn crazy high $core by harvesting ore from untamed, randomized asteroids! Fill your Atlas Mineralis with all the rare ore you harvest, collect all 50 rares! Complete an assortment of challenging tasks to become a full captain! The Azimuth Starmining Co-op is thrilled to have you on board, Captain. Now go mine the heck out of those asteroids!
